title: Knutsford
name: Tatton Park
content: A joint Cheshire County Council (CCC) and NT property. NT Members still have to pay for parking.<br>A substantial deer park, Tatton Park contains a petting zoo with farm animals and a Children's play area in addition and a major lake (mere) with sailing and fishing. <br>Tatton Park is also home to an annual Royal Horticultural Society (RHS) flower show (usually in late July) and plays host to a series of summer evening concerts each year, which vary from classical to pop.
